subsections.title: University of South Florida
content: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Expected May 2025.

subsections.title: Research Assistant
content: Conducted comprehensive research on bias in large language models.
Developed an AI personal assistant for learning paths and school course curricula.

subsections.title: AI/ML Software Engineer (Intern)
content: Engineered a mindfulness app with enhanced emotional self-awareness.
Implemented a machine learning API endpoint on AWS EC2, reducing latency by 80%.

subsections.title: AI/ML Developer (Intern)
content: Built a CNN model achieving 72% emotion classification accuracy.
Streamlined machine learning processes with automated pipelines.

subsections.title: Talk To Listen
content: A SaaS app with 1000+ active users and $3000 in sponsorship from Microsoft, OpenAI, and AWS.
Built a scalable distributed system and deployed machine learning models on AWS.

subsections.title: JobsDreamer
content: Launched a platform automating internship searches for students.
Integrated AI tools and cloud services to automate web scraping and email notifications.

subsections.title: api4all
content: Maintained an open-source project integrating models from top ML providers.
Conducted comprehensive comparisons to ensure optimal performance and functionality.

subsections.title: Bull Bot
content: Developed a full-stack chatbot answering queries across 1500+ USF websites.
Utilized Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and other NLP techniques.

subsections.title: TTL Dataset
content: Created and published an open-source dataset of 3M tokens for training Talk To Listen.

subsections.title: Global is Good, Local is Bad?
content: Understanding brand bias in large language models.
Published in 2024, focusing on mitigating bias in LLMs.

subsections.title: Dean's List
content: Consistently made the Dean's List during undergraduate studies at University of South Florida.

subsections.title: Tech Mentor
content: Volunteered as a tech mentor for underprivileged students, teaching basic programming skills.

subsections.title: Community Service
content: Participated in various community service activities, including organizing coding bootcamps.
